name: Diagnostic Test and Services
description: Testing may be ordered by your PCP. Below are the services and tests that are provided and located at Zuckerberg San Francisco General. Diagnostic tests and services: - Computed Tomography (CT): takes a picture of your bones and tissues together - Echocardiogram (Echo): takes a picture of your heart’s structure - Electrocardiogram (EKG or ECG): looks at your heart’s activity - Electroencephalogram (EEG): looks at your brain’s activity - Exercise Treadmill Test (ETT): looks at your heart while yo

whatTheyOffer: Testing may be ordered by your PCP. Below are the services and tests that are provided and located at Zuckerberg San Francisco General. Diagnostic tests and services: - Computed Tomography (CT): takes a picture of your bones and tissues together - Echocardiogram (Echo): takes a picture of your heart’s structure - Electrocardiogram (EKG or ECG): looks at your heart’s activity - Electroencephalogram (EEG): looks at your brain’s activity - Exercise Treadmill Test (ETT): looks at your heart while yo
howToGetIt: Before you can get a diagnostic test, you need to be a patient at a San Francisco Health Network clinic. Call Zuckerberg San Francisco General Hospital and Trauma Center at 628-206-8000 for more information or see service website.
